pageContent: Objectives: To review the psychosocial needs of men undergoing active surveillance (AS, the monitoring of early prostate cancer, with curative intervention only if the disease significantly progresses) for prostate cancer, and barriers to its uptake.

metaData.source:
Suitable sexual health care according to men with prostate cancer and their partners
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29876833/
